page.title: 13The Warmington Valley #1
page.content: This is a beautiful and unspoilt Valley running for some 5 miles from the base of Edge Hill and Gaydon in the North West to Little Bourton in the South East. The valley holds several villages,each being aproximately 2 miles apart.This is understood to date back to when a 1 mile walk each way was the maximum a farm labourer could make for a days work in the fields. The villages are:- {Mollington,Shotteswell,Avon Dasset, {Farnborough and Fenny Compton. A lane joins Mollington to Warmington 1.5 miles distant and links the A431 on the East to the A41 in the West.Halfway along,another leads South West along the valley bottom to Shotteswell and another to Farnborough The County boundary for OXON/WARWICKS wanders across the valley bottom.
